perturbation.original_text: The Bank has been duly organized and is validly existing as a federally-chartered savings bank in mutual form of organization and upon completion of the Conversion will become a duly organized and validly existing federally-chartered savings bank in permanent capital stock form of organization, in both instances duly authorized to conduct its business and own its property as described in the Registration Statement and the Prospectus; the Bank has obtained all licenses, permits and other governmental authorizations currently required for the conduct of its business, except those that individually or in the
perturbation.changed_text: The Bank has been duly organized and is validly existing as a federally-chartered savings bank in mutual form of organization and upon completion of the Conversion will become a duly organized and validly existing federally-chartered savings bank in permanent capital stock form of organization, in both instances authorized to conduct some business and own some property as described in the Registration Statement and the Prospectus; the Bank has obtained some licenses, permits and other governmental authorizations currently required for some business, except those that individually or in the
perturbation.explanation: By changing 'duly authorized to conduct its business and own its property' to 'authorized to conduct some business and own some property' and 'all licenses' to 'some licenses,' the contract introduces ambiguity about the scope of the bank's authorization and compliance. Federal regulations for banks require full authorization and comprehensive licensing for all aspects of their operations, not just 'some'.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Federal banking regulations require comprehensive authorization and licensing for all banking activities.

perturbation.original_text: The deposit accounts of the Bank are insured by the FDIC up to the applicable limits, and no proceedings for the termination or revocation of such insurance are pending or, to the best knowledge of the Company or the Bank, threatened. The Bank is a "qualified thrift lender" within the meaning of 12 U.S.C. §l467a(m).
perturbation.changed_text: The deposit accounts of the Bank may be insured by an insurer or not, and no proceedings for the termination or revocation of insurance are pending or, to the best knowledge of the Company or the Bank, threatened. The Bank is a "thrift lender" with a meaning.
perturbation.explanation: This alteration introduces a direct contradiction to established FDIC insurance requirements.  The statement 'may be insured by an insurer or not' defies the mandatory insurance coverage stipulated by the FDIC for deposit accounts in banks.  The removal of 'qualified' before 'thrift lender' and 'within the meaning of 12 U.S.C. §l467a(m)' after, the meaning becomes undefined.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Federal Deposit Insurance Act (FDIA) and related FDIC regulations mandating deposit insurance.

perturbation.original_text:
The Agent may terminate this Agreement by giving the notice indicated below in this Section 12 at any time after this Agreement becomes effective as follows:

(a) If any domestic or international event or act or occurrence has materially disrupted the United States securities markets such as to make it, in  the Agent's reasonable opinion, impracticable to proceed with the offering of the Shares; or if trading on the NYSE shall have suspended (except  that this shall not apply to the imposition of NYSE trading collars imposed on program trading); or if the United States shall have become involved  in a war or major hostilities; or if a general banking moratorium has been declared by a state or federal authority which has a material effect on the  Company on a consolidated basis; or if a moratorium in foreign exchange trading by major international banks or persons has been declared; or if  there shall have been a material adverse change in the financial condition, results of operations or  business of the Bank, or if the Bank shall have  sustained a material or substantial loss by fire, flood, accident, hurricane, earthquake, theft, sabotage or other calamity or malicious act, whether or  not said loss shall have been insured; or if there shall have been a material adverse change in the financial condition, results of operations or  business of the Bank.
perturbation.changed_text:
The Agent may terminate this Agreement by giving the notice indicated below in this Section 12 at any time after this Agreement becomes effective as follows:

(a) If any event or act or occurrence has disrupted the United States securities markets such as to make it, in the Agent's opinion, impracticable to proceed with the offering of the Shares; or if trading on the NYSE shall have suspended; or if the United States shall have become involved in a war; or if a banking moratorium has been declared by a state or federal authority which has an effect on the  Company; or if a moratorium in foreign exchange trading has been declared; or if there shall have been a change in the financial condition, results of operations or  business of the Bank, or if the Bank shall have  sustained a loss by fire, flood, accident, hurricane, earthquake, theft, sabotage or other calamity or malicious act, whether or not said loss shall have been insured; or if there shall have been a change in the financial condition, results of operations or  business of the Bank.
perturbation.explanation: By removing "materially" and "reasonable" from the Agent's opinion on market disruption, the termination clause becomes overly broad and subjective, conflicting with standards requiring demonstrable, significant impact. Similarly, removing "major", "general", "on a consolidated basis", "major international banks or persons", and "material or substantial" increases the risk of arbitrary termination. Deleting "except that this shall not apply to the imposition of NYSE trading collars imposed on program trading)" means now the Agreement can be canceled even if there is an imposition of NYSE trading collars imposed on program trading which are expected.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract law principles requiring good faith and reasonableness in exercising contractual rights.
